DESCRIPTION

  • Small company and website.
  • 1 city and up to 3 products / services. Max 3 adverts.
  • Campaign setup, research and feedback. (14-day timeline. Includes 30 minute consult.)
  • Once the order is placed we will be in contact within 4 working hours via email to assist further.
